plot: Every era has its immigrants, people looking for a new homeland. The film illuminates the today of a nearly forgotten microcosm - a possible paradise?
title: Etwas Paradies
plot_es: Every era has its immigrants, people looking for a new homeland. The film illuminates the today of a nearly forgotten microcosm - a possible paradise?
plot_en: Every era has its immigrants, people looking for a new homeland. The film illuminates the today of a nearly forgotten microcosm - a possible paradise?
